title: Ep49: South Notts Hussars - Advance to Tunis
itunes:title: Ep49: South Notts Hussars - Advance to Tunis
itunes:subtitle: Peter and Gary continue following in the footsteps of the South Notts Hussars, a WW2 artillery unit, as they join the Tunisian campaign of 1943. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great...
description:
Peter and Gary continue following in the footsteps of the South Notts Hussars, a WW2 artillery unit, as they join the Tunisian campaign of 1943.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Peter Hart's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
